text: @realDonaldTrump @HARRISFAULKNER @FoxNews You know you do not value the lives of your followers & their families.  If you did you wouldn't ask them to risk the danger of Covid19 to attend your rally. You KNOW there is a very real risk, or you wouldn't force them to agree not to hold you legally responsible.  SAD.
